Fantasy league teams

Source: R/league-teams.R
league_teams.Rd

Return the fantasy team names and their owners.

league_teams(lid = getOption("lid"), old = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

lid

ESPN League ID, defaults to getOption("lid") (see set_lid()).
old

If FALSE (default), return only the current season's data. If TRUE, return a list with all prior seasons.
...

Additional API query arguments; use "week" as a shorthand for "ScoringPeriodId" to display past rosters, etc.

Value

A tibble (or list) of league teams.

Examples

league_teams(lid = 252353)

#> # A tibble: 8 x 5
#>    team abbrev owners                               name                    year
#>   <int> <chr>  <chr>                                <chr>                  <int>
#> 1     1 AGUS   {12E61406-349A-4DC7-A614-06349AADC7… Obi-Wan Mahomey         2020
#> 2     3 PEPE   {5FA14794-6573-4189-A147-9465737189… JuJu's Bizarre Advent…  2020
#> 3     4 BILL   {91F8B424-1689-472E-B8B4-241689172E… Bill's Fantasy Team     2020
#> 4     5 CART   {F33F0723-2CC3-4A1C-BF07-232CC34A1C… Kenyan Younghoes        2020
#> 5     6 KIER   {22DFE7FF-9DF2-4F3B-9FE7-FF9DF2AF3B… The Nuklear Option      2020
#> 6     8 CORE   {9A722A48-6E16-42BC-9E0E-AC9E4E6D7A… BIG TRUZZZ              2020
#> 7    10 NICK   {35D9B7DB-E821-453C-99B7-DBE821353C… Kareemy Johnson         2020
#> 8    11 KYLE   {C61F403A-F689-4269-879E-145B897F23… Harry Ruggs             2020
